ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup chopped green pepper or red pepper
1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup (Regular, 98% Fat Free or 25% Less Sodium)
1 ½ cups cubed cooked chicken or ham
4 cups hot cooked regular long-grain white rice

cookingTips: Use pre-cooked rotisserie chicken to save time
Heat soup and milk gently to prevent scorching
Keep rice warm separately and combine just before serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through quick assembly techniques and how condensed soup serves as a flavor and binding base.
